contextId.information: This has a quotation within a quotation. The direct quotation can be stated as an indirect quotation. AT: "and say to the people there that you have come to sacrifice to Yahweh." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotesinquotes]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
contextId.quote: and say, 'I have come to sacrifice to Yahweh.'
